tool_description: This API will show LIVE  stats about the top 10 crypto-currencies in the market
name: cryptoStats
title: cryptoStats

api_list.name: Get all stats for the crypto-currencies
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the live stats about the crypto-currencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptostats.p.rapidapi.com/cryptoprice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptostats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptostats.p.rapidapi.com/cryptoprice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptostats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
